嘴.definition: mouth; beak; nozzle; spout (of teapot etc); CL:張|张[zhang1],個|个[ge4]

嘴上沒毛，辦事不牢.pinyin: zui3 shang4 mei2 mao2 , ban4 shi4 bu4 lao2
嘴上沒毛，辦事不牢.definition: a youth without facial hair cannot be relied upon (proverb)

嘴上無毛，辦事不牢.pinyin: zui3 shang4 wu2 mao2 , ban4 shi4 bu4 lao2
嘴上無毛，辦事不牢.definition: see 嘴上沒毛，辦事不牢|嘴上没毛，办事不牢[zui3 shang4 mei2 mao2 , ban4 shi4 bu4 lao2]

嘴乖.definition: (coll.) to speak in a clever and lovable way

嘴啃泥.definition: to fall flat on one's face

嘴尖.definition: sharp-tongued; to have a keen sense of taste; to be picky about one's food

嘴巴.definition: mouth (CL:張|张[zhang1]); slap in the face (CL:個|个[ge4])

嘴敞.definition: to have a loose tongue; talkative

嘴替.definition: (slang) sb who effectively articulates others' thoughts or feelings on their behalf

嘴欠.definition: (coll.) unable to control one's tongue; prone to say sth nasty

嘴炮.definition: (Internet slang) to mouth off; to shoot one's mouth off; sb who does that

嘴瓢.definition: (coll.) to get one's words mixed up; to misspeak

嘴甜心苦.definition: sweet mouth, bitter heart (idiom); insincere flattery

嘴硬心軟.definition: see 刀子嘴，豆腐心[dao1 zi5 zui3 , dou4 fu5 xin1]

嘴臉.definition: features, face (esp. derogatorily); look; appearance; countenance

嘴裡.definition: mouth; in the mouth; on one's lips; speech; words

嘴賤.definition: prone to saying sth inappropriate or offensive
